name: Finalem Missio
description:
in the not so distant future, the church started working along science to develop clones, with their own reasons and intentions in mind. One of them: to destroy the personification of evil on earth, the being called the False Prophet. He resides on a large gothic structure called THE CATHEDRAL.

You're jim, the latest clone, and by chance, you've just got the mission of going to THE CATHEDRAL, on a rescue mission that may not turn out as planned. 

____________________________________

This is an action-adventure game with puzzle elements. Choices matter, and there's more than one ending.
